verses.text: \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w child|strong="H5288"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* loved \w him|strong="H7121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* out \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w My|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.\f + \fr 11:1 \ft Cited in Matthew 2:15\f*

\w But|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w more|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* Israel, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* farther \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w departed|strong="H1980"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w Me|strong="H6440"\w*.\f + \fr 11:2 \ft LXX; Hebrew The more they called them, the more they went from them.\f* \w They|strong="H3651"\w* \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Baals|strong="H1168"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w burned|strong="H6999"\w* \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w carved|strong="H6456"\w* \w images|strong="H6456"\w*.

\w It|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* \w taught|strong="H3045"\w* Ephraim \f + \fr 11:3 \ft That is, the northern kingdom of Israel; also in verses 8, 9, and 12\f* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* walk, \w taking|strong="H3947"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w My|strong="H3947"\w* \w arms|strong="H2220"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w realized|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* \w healed|strong="H7495"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w led|strong="H4900"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w cords|strong="H5688"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* kindness, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w ropes|strong="H5688"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* love; \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w lifted|strong="H7311"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* necks \w and|strong="H4900"\w* \w bent|strong="H5186"\w* \w down|strong="H5186"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* feed \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Will|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w ruled|strong="H4428"\w* \w by|strong="H3808"\w* Assyria \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w refused|strong="H3985"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w repent|strong="H7725"\w*?

\w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* flash \w through|strong="H5892"\w* \w their|strong="H3615"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*; \w it|strong="H3615"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w destroy|strong="H3615"\w* \w the|strong="H3615"\w* bars \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w their|strong="H3615"\w* gates \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w consume|strong="H3615"\w* \w them|strong="H3615"\w* \w in|strong="H5892"\w* \w their|strong="H3615"\w* own plans.

\w My|strong="H7311"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w bent|strong="H8511"\w* \w on|strong="H7121"\w* \w turning|strong="H4878"\w* \w from|strong="H5971"\w* \w Me|strong="H7121"\w*. Though \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* Most \w High|strong="H7311"\w*, \w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w by|strong="H7121"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* means \w exalt|strong="H7311"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w*. God’s Love for Israel

How could \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Ephraim? How could \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w surrender|strong="H4042"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? How could \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w like|strong="H3478"\w* Admah? How could \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w treat|strong="H7760"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w like|strong="H3478"\w* \w Zeboiim|strong="H6636"\w*? \w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* \w within|strong="H5921"\w* \w Me|strong="H5414"\w*; \w My|strong="H5414"\w* compassion \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w stirred|strong="H3648"\w*!

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w execute|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w full|strong="H7725"\w* \w fury|strong="H2740"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w My|strong="H7725"\w* \w anger|strong="H2740"\w*; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* Ephraim. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* man— \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w One|strong="H6918"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*— \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H7725"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2740"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w roar|strong="H7580"\w* \w like|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lion. \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w roars|strong="H7580"\w*, \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H3212"\w* \w trembling|strong="H2729"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w west|strong="H3220"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H2729"\w* \w trembling|strong="H2729"\w* \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w birds|strong="H6833"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w doves|strong="H3123"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* land \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Assyria. \w Then|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w settle|strong="H3427"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w homes|strong="H1004"\w*, \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

Ephraim surrounds Me with lies, the house of Israel with deceit; but Judah still walks with God and is faithful to the Holy One.\f + \fr 11:12 \ft Or and Judah is unruly against God, the faithful Holy One\f*
